title: Episode 254: Ghetto Karma Sutra (Feat. Ace Hood and his wife Shelah Marie)
itunes:title: Episode 254: Ghetto Karma Sutra (Feat. Ace Hood and his wife Shelah Marie)
description:
Rapper Ace Hood and his wife, Shelah Marie plays the “Newlywed Game” where they have to answer tough questions about each other. They also open up about the success of their blended family, and much more! Ace Hood’s next album, Mr. Hood, drops May 29th. In the meantime, make sure to check out his latest EP, Self-Preservation. Enjoy!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: Rapper Ace Hood and his wife, Shelah Marie, join the ladies of Lip Service for the second part of our Memorial Day Special.
itunes:author: Angela Yee, Inc.
